body:
This post will be updated with any changes so be sure to check it for future updates.



Information
  • The gamemodes will be CTF, 5CP and CTW
  • We will accept as many teams as possible, with 8 hopefully being the minimum.
  • Tournament will be single elimination with seedings being based off last tournament and the official's opinion (sorry but there's no better way to really do it). 
  • All rounds will be BO3 with the final a BO5.
  • Maximum of 18 players can be signed up with a minumum of 12. 
  • Maximum of 8 players on the field with a minumum of 6. 
  • Please feel free to apply for referee or streamer below, it really helps if you have past experience too.
  • We will be using Avicus teamspeak where the seniors will be providing team channels for all signed-up teams. 
  • We will be using Avicus scrim servers so I would kindly ask that you do not book any for the dates of February 4th and 5th.
Dates
  • Registration opens - Closed
  • Map pool announced - January 1st
  • Registration closes - January 12th 11:59pm GMT
  • Teams and brackets released - January 14th 
  • Tournament  - February 4th
Registration and ref/streamer applications
  • To register your team for the tournament fill out Closed
  • To apply for streamer or a ref: Closed
Staff 
Hosts 
{tag=54964b606ce749229a4c2b981d8c2ed7} & {tag=1c74c43029a0471fb30bcc2d9031ebcb} 

New Bracket - http://challonge.com/cbtr

Timings
February 4th (All rounds including finals)

Round 1 - 4pm GMT
Semifinals - 5pm/5:30pm GMT
Final - 6:30pm/7pm GMT

Map Pool (In order of play)
Map pool won't be as competitive and will also be repetitive due to some being removed, sorry there's nothing I can do
  • Round 1 - Terra CTF / Fossil 5CP / Wool Terrace CTF
  • Semi-finals - Wool Terrace CTF / Nuclear 5CP / Terra CTF
  • Final - Nuclear 5CP / Monthand 5CP / Boolean TE / Winters Day CTW / Terra CTF

replies.body:
Registration is now closed (we currently have 9 teams). Two teams will have to play a match before the tourney officially starts to decide who will advance with the other 7 teams.

Thanks to all the mapdevs, especially Prodigy and  Posighdun, for doing the xmls to most of the maps.

Brackets will be released soon, thanks for the patience <3

reply_to.body_tagged:
Finalized dates, times, maps and staff

Bracket - http://challonge.com/capback
Public Rosters - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xOu2DQ97JdXdZI570BhUMPgLtLGZAS87Uqyexk6qSlc/edit?usp=sharing

Due to yet another set back, the tournament will now take place on the 4th and 5th of February, all the timings are below.

February 4th (Rounds 1-3, Losers Rounds 1-3)

Round 1 - 4pm GMT
Round 2 - 5pm GMT
Round 3 - 6pm GMT
Losers Round 1 - 6pm GMT
Losers Round 2 - 7pm GMT
Losers Round 3 - 8pm GMT

February 5th (Semi-finals, Finals, Losers Rounds 4-5)

Losers Round 3 - 4pm GMT
Semi-finals - 4pm GMT
Losers Round 4 - 5pm GMT
Losers Round 5 - 6pm GMT
Final - 7pm GMT

Map Pool

AlpineTE (CTF)
Launch (CTF)

Monthand5CP (5CP)
Fracture (5CP)
Stoneshock (5CP)

Staff

Could all the staff please add me on skype (spookehyt@gmail.com) so I can make a group chat.

Referees 
Acceqted
imryaan
ProfessorUtonium
_Nathy
Sweedie
DaFrozenBlaze
AMIES
Eteh

Streamers
dev_revs
XtraMajestical

replies.body:
Sorry about the late notice but I'll run the tourney this Saturday only with it being a lot more simplified: 
  • Single elimination
  • Bo3 5CP / CTF Round 1 and semi-finals
  • Bo5 CTW / 5CP / CTF Finals
New Bracket - http://challonge.com/cbtr

Timings
February 4th (All rounds including finals)
Round 1 - 4pm GMT
Semifinals - 5pm/5:30pm GMT
Final - 6:30pm/7pm GMT

Map Pool (In order of play)
Map pool won't be as competitive and will also be repetitive due to some being removed, sorry there's nothing I can do
  • Round 1 - Terra CTF / Fossil 5CP / Wool Terrace CTF
  • Semi-finals - Wool Terrace CTF / Nuclear 5CP / Terra CTF
  • Final - Boolean CTW / Winters Day CTW / Nuclear 5CP / Terra CTF / Monthand  5CP
Pretty sure all gamemodes apart from CTW don't work in 1.7 so don't try to join. Also any teams who want to help out just reserve a server for the times shown above.
Please spread this post around to teams who might not read it, anyone who wants to ref/stream poke me on ts before the tourney, thanks :p
